title: @Riot KateyKhaos: DJ Sona's Turntable Switch
body: Katey, was your original intent for Sona to change songs/turntables upon using an ability? It's similar to what the team did with Udyr.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Nope, that was never the intent. 

We wanted several different music tracks.  In order for them not to sound really odd because they're being switched so frequently (if we changed music per ability), we decided to let players toggle the different music/decks when they wanted to, so they could have the music they wanted to listen to/ the deck they wanted to use.

Was there ever plan to do more than three songs?

Also, do you know if a dev blog is planned for DJ Sona?

Three was the number that's been floating around for a while. Who knows, though, maybe she could hold another concert! :o I know I'd be down for more music! 

Not sure about the dev blog.

Well I hope there is one. Clearly a LOT of work went into this skin and I'd love to hear about its production!

day one buy~
I'd really love to see a dev blog about the development of DJ Sona
